short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that shows random dad jokes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dad Jokes Extension

Brighten your day with a dose of dad humor! The Dad Jokes Extension delivers a random dad joke every time you open it. Simple, fun, and guaranteed to make you smile, this extension is perfect for those moments when you need a quick laugh. Click the refresh button to get a new joke anytime!

Features:

Get a random dad joke on demand
Clean and user-friendly interface
Instant refresh for new jokes
Install now and enjoy endless dad jokes at your fingertips!
